participant_1.background:
I want to show my music to the world!
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change.
On the weekend, I might drum in a band or watch a movie about aliens invading the earth.
I love my quiet home in the suburbs, but I often go into the city for fun and excitement.
I'm going to make some blue clothes to wear when the weather is warmer.

content.text: I know right! I just took a shower to cool off and try to tame my hair.
I love the feeling of freshly washed hair.
I know right? It makes me feel refreshed and ready to take on the day.
I'm going to make some blue clothes to wear when the weather is warmer.
That sounds fun! I love blue.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change.
I know what you mean. I grew up in a small town too, but I moved to the city for college and I've never looked back.
I'm thinking about moving to the city too. I love the excitement and the energy.
I think you'd love it here. There's always something to do and there's always people to meet.
I'm excited to see what the future holds.
Me too! I know it's going to be great.
